state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to venture east. If you can manage that, make an effort to go to the east. With that over with, try to venture south. And then, go to the west. And then, make an effort to go south. Then, make an attempt to venture west. And then, travel north. If you can accomplish that, attempt to venture east. Okay, and then, move east. With that done, go north. Okay, and then, go to the north. With that accomplished, try to move north. And then, try to go to the north. And then, head north. Following that, pick up the coin from the floor of the study. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Cookery =- You arrive in a cookery. A normal one. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cookery =-0/1
